description: globally unique id for this event
name: id

description: BSON id of the user that this push notification was sent to
name: user_id

description: external user id of the user
name: external_user_id

description: API ID of the app this action occurred on
name: app_id

description: unix timestamp at which the push notification bounced
name: time

description: platform for the bounce (null for backward compatibility)
name: platform

description: API ID of the campaign this push notification belongs to
name: campaign_id

description: API ID of the message variation this user received
name: message_variation_id

description: API ID of the canvas this push notification belongs to
name: canvas_id

description: API ID of the canvas variation this user received
name: canvas_variation_id

description: API ID of the canvas step this push notification belongs to
name: canvas_step_id

description: message send ID this message belongs to
name: send_id

description: device_id that we made a delivery attempt to that bounced
name: device_id
